articles.description: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.
articles.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes

articles.description: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.
articles.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator

articles.description: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.
articles.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'

articles.description: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.
articles.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'

articles.description: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.
articles.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains

articles.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain

articles.description: Ledger's Chief Experience Officer Ian Rogers sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk security, hacks, and where the current generation of smartphone crypto wallets fall short.
articles.title: Ledger: 'Probably Five Years' Before Phones With Fully Integrated Hardware Wallets

articles.description: Notcoin, a simple clicker-style game within messaging app Telegram, has racked up over 25 million players since the start of 2024 and plans to convert the trillions of virtual coins mined so far into a real crypto token on The Open Network. Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to explain the viral phenomenon.
articles.title: What Is Notcoin? Co-Creator Sasha Plotvinov Explains the Viral Telegram Game and Token

articles.description: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.
articles.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move

articles.description: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.
articles.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler

articles.description:
Reza is joined by Sam Simmons, founder of MintPass. 


They discuss:
- The Parallels between Professional Poker and Crypto
- The profitability of Ethics
- The "Recommend-To-Earn" economy
articles.title: Recommend-To-Earn: Tokenizing Travel Recommendations with Sam Simmons

articles.description: The Collected's Rachel Wilkins joins digital artist Grant Riven Yun to explore his remarkable journey blending art with medical studies, to achieve over $2 million in sales.
articles.title: The Collected: Grant Riven Yun's Journey Through Art and Medicine

articles.description: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.
articles.title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'

articles.description: Luke Barwikowski, founder of farming game Pixels on Ronin, joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the incoming launch of the PIXEL token and why he sees it as such a turning point for the rising blockchain game.
articles.title: Pixels Founder: Why PIXEL Token Launch Feels Like 'Day One' for Ronin Game

articles.description: Yat Siu, CEO and co-founder of Animoca Brands, joins the FOMO Hour to discuss his view of the Web3 gaming space, how 2024 is already shaping up to be a big year for crypto gaming, the importance of education in the Web3 space, and much, much more.
articles.title: Animoca’s Yat Siu: How Crypto Gaming Gains Mass Adoption
